page.title: 04The village craft shop
page.content: My Mum owns a shop with her partner and they call it{The Country Shop.}It is located in The Sreet, Chilcompton. The shop has been open for nearly two years. It is a furniture shop mainly, but also sells gifts, cards and local craft work. The shop also sells furniture which is mostly{Victorian {Pine.}My Mother and her partner buy old chests of drawers, dressers, cupboards and tables. They then strip off the paintwork in a special tank. They then sand the piece with an electric sander and give it a finish with{beeswax polish.}This gives it a lovely golden colour. Lots of people who live in the village are clever with their hands and make things to sell in the shop. Such things as patchwork cushions, quilts, children's clothes, jewellery, paintings and pottery.
